contexts.context: ...nothing was ever put away, and where his loving <mark>eye</mark> saw method, even the least fussy visitor could...
...was no one about apart from the wall-<mark>eyed</mark> dog, an exceptionally hideous mongrel belonging to Frau...
...Strobl walked in and out and rolled a baleful <mark>eye</mark> on us as she spoke into Chester´s ear...
...In a moment, in the twinkling of an <mark>eye</mark>, at the last trump: for the trumpet...
...Can you elucidate? My worm´s <mark>eye</mark> view of the arrangements for the funeral goes iknto...
